title: anbone anaiyE
sahitya:
anbon annaiyE nAn unaiyE nambinEn



anupallavi



shempon ambOruhattiruvE bhakta taruvE sadguru vElavar padam paravu-tamizh
hitam peravE



caraNam



madhura mAmozhi koDezhil kulavu tirumAl manamagizh ramA enavE madhura
bhArati shashi umA rati tudi puri sundariyE madhuramODamar catura madhura
navarasamadAra unadudAraaruL migha varamadAra kavi kunjaradAsan en manamadAra
vara kumAranishai vara
